name: hobo stove
description: This is a small improvised wood stove, made from a metal can or similar container of the right size.  Useful for cooking, uses simple tinder.

name: hobo stove (lit)
//: Dummied out due to reverting hobo stove behavior, to be consistent with existing items. -Chaosvolt
description: This is a small improvised wood stove, made from a metal can or similar container of the right size.  Useful for cooking, uses simple tinder.

name: flint and steel
description: This is a carefully-selected piece of flint and a carbon steel fire starter.  Use it to spark a flame.

name: ember carrier
description: This is a small container for holding tinder, with holes punched in it to provide a controlled airflow.  It can nurture a smoldering ember for a long time, to start fires without modern tools.

use_action.need_fire_msg: You need a lighter or fire to light this.

name: ember carrier (lit)
description: This is a small container for holding tinder, with holes punched in it to provide a controlled airflow.  An ember is smoldering inside it, and can be used to start a campfire.

name: steel bottle
description: A stainless steel water bottle, holds 750ml of liquid.

name: resinous cord
description: Primitive binding material made of cords and natural glue.  Use it to repair items made of wood, paper, bone, or chitin.

name: throwing stick
description: A stick carved into a shape suitable for throwing at a target.  Not a boomerang, so don't expect it to return to your hand.

name: hand axe
description: This is a broad piece of sharpened stone, with enough left untouched to hold safely.  The swiss army knife of the lower paleolithic.

name: atlatl
description: A wooden tool for supporting a javelin, to throw it more effectively than by hand.

name: wooden javelin
//: Item type intentionally converted from GENERIC to AMMO

name: stone javelin
//: Avoids negative numbers caused by any future rebalancing of mainline item
description: A throwing spear with a stone spearhead.  The grip area has also been carved and covered for better grip.

name: iron javelin
//: Item type intentionally converted from GENERIC to AMMO

name: copper javelin
//: Avoids negative numbers caused by any future rebalancing of mainline item
description: A copper-tipped throwing spear.  The grip area has also been carved and covered for better grip.

name: stone spear
description: A stout wooden pole with a sharp stone spearhead.

name: small batch of curdling milk
description: A sealed small waterskin filled with milk that is undergoing the process to become a crude form of cheese, having had vinegar and natural rennet added.

use_action.msg: The milk appears to have finished curdling, and is ready for further processing.  Checking on it has exposed the mixture to the atmosphere.

name: batch of curdling milk
description: A sealed waterskin filled with milk that is undergoing the process to become a crude form of cheese, having had vinegar and natural rennet added.

use_action.msg: The milk appears to have finished curdling, and is ready for further processing.  Checking on it has exposed the mixture to the atmosphere.

name: large batch of curdling milk
description: A sealed large waterskin filled with milk that is undergoing the process to become a crude form of cheese, having had vinegar and natural rennet added.

use_action.msg: The milk appears to have finished curdling, and is ready for further processing.  Checking on it has exposed the mixture to the atmosphere.

name: aluminum foil wrap
description: A half crumpled sheet of aluminum foil, used for cooking and baking.

name: hexamine stove
description: Known as an Esbit stove, this is a lightweight, folding stove designed to use small hexamine tablets for cooking.

name: foldable plastic bottle
description: A non-rigid plastic bottle for easy storage, holds 500 ml of liquid.

name: mess tin
description: A compact military-style pan and tray, designed for heating food over a fire or portable stove.  It is shallower than a proper pot or pan, and lacks the integrated heating elements modern mess kits have.

name: makeshift pot
description: A sheet of metal crudely hammered into a cooking pot.  Good enough to cook food and boil water, but not as useful as proper cookware.

name: makeshift copper pot
description: A cooking pot crudely hammered out of copper.  Good enough to cook food and boil water, but not as useful as proper cookware.

name: wooden canteen
description: A water canteen made from wood, secured by metal bands and sealed with wax or pitch.  Holds 1.5 liters and has a simple carry strap.

name: makeshift axe
description: This is a sharpened chunk of steel affixed to a stick.  It works passably well as an axe but really can't compare to a proper axe.

name: makeshift shovel
description: This is a crudely-worked piece of sheet metal, affixed to a stick.  It works passably well as a shovel but really can't compare to a real shovel.

name: whistle multitool
description: A cheap gadget combining a whistle, thermometer, magnifying glass, and button compass.

use_action.//: Somewhat lower than the proper whistle.

name: mortar and pestle
description: This is a simple combination of a small grindstone and a bowl-shaped stone.  Used for grinding grain, but time-consuming compared to more complex methods.
